__TOC__

Pia is an Ubuntu user, and also an active community member. She is currently the vice president of <nowiki>[[http://linux.org.au|Linux Australia]]</nowiki>, on the board of the <nowiki>[[http://softwarefreedomday.org|Software Freedom Day]]</nowiki>, and also a conference tripper around the world. Her blog is at http://pipka.org/blog/
